description:
The battle against Amupura and Janahn Ghalan begins. Even with the entire might of the agency, things look grim.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guillotine of Spiders: Time of Snakes
Kumo no Dantoudai Hebi no Kokugen
Schafott der Spinne, Zeit der Schlange
Échafaud de l`araignée, temps du serpent
蜘蛛の断頭台・蛇の刻限
